name: Boxed, Inc.
description: Boxed, Inc. is an innovative e-commerce platform that aims to revolutionize the way consumers shop for bulk products. Founded in 2013, Boxed provides a convenient online shopping experience for families and businesses alike, offering a wide range of products, from groceries and household essentials to health and beauty items. The company differentiates itself by focusing on bulk purchasing, allowing customers to buy larger quantities at competitive prices, all delivered directly to their doorsteps. With a user-friendly website and mobile app, Boxed makes it easy for customers to find the items they need while enjoying the benefits of cost savings and convenience. In addition to its core product offerings, Boxed is committed to providing exceptional customer service, ensuring a seamless shopping experience. The company also emphasizes sustainability by working towards reducing its carbon footprint and implementing eco-friendly practices in its operations. As the demand for online grocery shopping continues to rise, Boxed is strategically positioned to capture a significant share of this growing market, leveraging technology and data analytics to enhance its logistics and supply chain operations. Boxed's mission is to provide customers with a hassle-free shopping experience while delivering value and quality in every order.

seo.meta_title: Boxed, Inc. | Bulk Shopping Made Easy
seo.meta_description: Discover Boxed, Inc., a leading e-commerce platform for bulk shopping. Shop groceries, household essentials, and more delivered to your door.

faq.question: What is Boxed known for?
faq.answer: Boxed is known for its online platform that allows customers to purchase bulk products conveniently.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Boxed?
faq.answer: Chieh Huang is the CEO of Boxed, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Boxed headquartered?
faq.answer: Boxed is headquartered in New York, New York, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Boxed offer?
faq.answer: Boxed offers a wide range of products including groceries, household essentials, and personal care items.
